summary: New wave is a music genre from the 1970s and 1980s, known for its catchy pop sound and experimental style. It started as a term for music after punk rock, then expanded to include synth-pop and alternative dance. New wave had funny, unique sounds, electronic beats, and stylish fashion. It was big in the early 1980s, especially with the help of MTV. The genre peaked in popularity and then faded, but has made comebacks over the years.
title: New wave music
